about_the_game:
The Gods of SMITE will heed your call! Unlock all present and future gods with the SMITE Ultimate God Pack.

Wield Thor’s hammer, pull the sun from the Sky as Maui, turn your foes to stone as Medusa, or flex your divine power as one of 100+ other mythological icons.

If you've previously purchased gods with favor or gems, you will be refunded the favor cost upon purchase of the SMITE Ultimate God Pack.
detailed_description:
The Gods of SMITE will heed your call! Unlock all present and future gods with the SMITE Ultimate God Pack.

Wield Thor’s hammer, pull the sun from the Sky as Maui, turn your foes to stone as Medusa, or flex your divine power as one of 100+ other mythological icons.

If you've previously purchased gods with favor or gems, you will be refunded the favor cost upon purchase of the SMITE Ultimate God Pack.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Althon X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or Nvidia graphics card with 512MB video ram or better and Shader Model 3.0+ support. (ATI Radeon 3870 or higher, Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT or higher)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.67 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6950 or better with 768 MB+ of VRAM (DirectX 11 Compatible)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

name: SMITE® - Ultimate God Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Athlon X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10 64-bit (latest Service Pack)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Phenom II X3, 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or ATI Radeon HD 7950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

dejus.descriptors: Contains: Murders, Presence of Blood, Legal Drugs Consumption, Erotic Content

short_description: The Gods of SMITE will heed your call! Unlock all present and future gods with the SMITE Ultimate God Pack. If you've previously purchased gods with favor or gems, you will be refunded the favor cost upon purchase of the SMITE Ultimate God Pack.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian
*languages with full audio support
